local_intent: Execute grasp of white_plate (active Pick node); perceive, approach/align, pick, and verify object in gripper.
assumptions: White plate is visible or detectable in the frame
Gripper is open and ready to grasp
Computed grasp pose will be stored under 'white_plate_grasp'
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase from the global plan: detect white plate, move above, compute grasp pose, align, execute Pick, then verify with ObjectInGripper.
